name: Payuuuuuu
wishText: May the year ahead filled lots of joy! ;)
text1: Vaise aaj kuch hai kya ? Holy Shitt!! Aaj toh ek bandar i mean Bandariya ka Birthdayy haiii
text2: Haha That's you only Dear XD , It's your birthday!!! :D
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yuu! Many many happy blah...
text3: That's what I was going to do.
text5: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back down to earth don't fly in space ji
replayText: Click again , if you wanna rejoice and feel a virtual hug from distance.
